entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
